skillTree.localised_description: Very large and dead, yet still exceedingly dangerous; whoever sits astride this carnivorous crustacean must be *extremely* confident of their power.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"
You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The dead rarely stay that way around these parts... and like to remind the living of their sins.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Damned Knights Errant

skillTree.localised_description: "…and by the end the ocean itself was a deep red, like a vast vat of wine."

effects.description: Increased melee stats for Damned Knights Errant

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Damned Knights Errant

skillTree.localised_description: In truth, the oceans of this world are its largest cemetaries.

effects.description: Increased entities for Damned Knights Errant

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Damned Knights Errant

skillTree.localised_description: Some things should just never be brought over into the mortal world. Not ever.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Damned Knights of the Realm

skillTree.localised_description: To raise fallen champions such as these, in betrayal of The Lady to serve new masters, is profanation indeed!

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Damned Questing Knights

skillTree.localised_description: Maybe Cylostra's dulcet tones sound like whalesong beneath the waves, calling the monsters of the deep to her service?
Such a strong emotion can summon the darkest forces imaginable to your side.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Mourngul Haunters
	(factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: You don't want to get on her bad side… or any side, come to think of it!

skillTree.localised_description: Calm waters belie the lurching terror beneath.

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Sheer, undiluted spite sharpens the dead eye further.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Spiteful Shot"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: No matter how far away, none can escape the Kiss of the Deep, nor breathe again with lungs full of seawater.
The tidal currents shall slow the foe's advance.

skillTree.localised_description: All manner of creatures infest the deep, many who have never - and should never - be seen above the waves.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Rotting Prometheans

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Denizens of the Deep"

skillTree.localised_description: As surely as night follows day, when the mist descends, death isn't far behind.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Once the mighty Kraken's tentacles take hold, only the toughest can fight their way free.

skillTree.localised_description: Like Unliving moths drawn inexorably towards a dazzling flame, the risen drowned strive - and stumble - to always be close to the one who has bound them.

skillTree.localised_description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"
The once-men of the Undead legions march ever onwards, according to the will of their binder.

skillTree.localised_description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
They could not break free, even if they wanted to.
Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.
If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

skillTree.localised_description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Deep within the boards and bulkheads, an intelligence stirs…

skillTree.localised_description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.
Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.
Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

factionEffects.localised_description: Cylostra’s performance for the Phoenix King would have been her greatest achievement, but it was cruelly snatched from her grasp by the cold depths of the Great Ocean. Now she has returned. No longer constrained by mortal bonds, her sole purpose is to perform – to show the world she is the greatest prima donna to ever have lived and died!

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Syreen and Mourngul units
Recruitment cost: -15% for Syreen and Mourngul units
Spell resistance: 10% for Animated Hulks, Bloated Corpse, and Mourngul units

items.colour_text: This enchanted fan keeps Cylostra cool when the heat is on, improving the recharge of her abilities and reducing their cooldown times.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Cylostra is a vengeful spirit intent on performing for the Phoenix King, willing to sink all of Ulthuan to achieve her undying goal.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
